Member mr::dPdst (miVector &dPds, miVector &dPdt, const miState *const state, const int idx=0)
: The following routines here could be sped up a tad if we record the triangle id (instance, state->pri + state->pri_idx) and cache its dPds, dNds, etc. This has to be done for each miState. With that we can avoid recalculating them each time, as likely several contiguous samples will hit the same triangle.
